jobs.description:
Job Summary

We are looking for an experienced and results-driven Marketing Manager to lead our brand positioning, lead generation, and customer engagement efforts. You will be responsible for planning, executing, and optimizing 360-degree marketing strategies to support our project launches, build brand awareness, and drive qualified leads.

Key Responsibilities

Strategic Planning & Execution
Develop and implement comprehensive marketing strategies for residential and commercial projects.
Align marketing plans with sales targets, project timelines, and company goals.
Brand Management
Build and manage the brand image across all offline and online channels.
Ensure consistency of brand messaging across campaigns, events, and communication.
Lead Generation & Digital Marketing
Drive qualified lead generation through performance marketing (Google Ads, Facebook, Instagram, SEO, etc.).
Monitor and optimize digital campaigns for maximum ROI.
Content & Creative Development
Oversee the development of marketing collaterals: brochures, videos, presentations, emailers, etc.
Coordinate with design teams and agencies for high-quality creative output.
Event & Launch Management
Plan and execute property launches, customer events, and channel partner meets.
Coordinate with sales and operations for smooth event execution.
Market Research & Insights
Conduct competitor analysis, customer segmentation, and market trend studies.
Gather insights to improve marketing strategies and project positioning.
Agency & Vendor Coordination
Manage relationships with digital agencies, PR firms, media partners, and other vendors.
Negotiate media buying, outdoor campaigns, and influencer partnerships.
Reporting & Budgeting
Track marketing performance metrics and prepare regular reports for leadership.
Manage the marketing budget and ensure cost-effective campaign execution.

Qualifications & Skills

Bachelors degree in Marketing, Business, or related field; MBA preferred.
5–8 years of experience in marketing; experience in real estate is a strong advantage.
Strong understanding of both digital and traditional marketing channels.
Proven experience in managing large-scale campaigns and lead-generation funnels.
Excellent communication, project management, and leadership skills.
Creative thinking with analytical problem-solving abilities.
Familiarity with CRM tools (like Salesforce, Zoho), Google Analytics, and Ad platforms.

What We Offer

Opportunity to be part of a high-growth, entrepreneurial environment.
Work on marquee real estate projects shaping Bangalore’s skyline.
Competitive compensation and performance-linked incentives.
Collaborative and dynamic team culture.

jobs.title: Manager - Marketing
jobs.description:
Mandate 1 The role is based out of Bangalore and the expectation is to work out of the ETV office.




About the Role




Swiggy Dineout is in its early stages of building and winning the dining-out category. We are unlocking massive opportunities across cities and customer segments, shaping how India discovers restaurants, experiences value, and celebrates food culture.




We are seeking a high-agency brand marketer who blends sharp strategy with strong creative judgement. This role sits at the intersection of 360 brand building, city marketing, creators, PR, and partnerships, with a clear line to business outcomes.




You will be instrumental in driving two high-impact charters:




Brand and IPs: Build the Dineout brand through national campaigns and repeatable IPs that drive awareness, consideration, and share of search.




City and Culture: Create city playbooks, festival moments, and on-ground experiences in collaboration with regional teams and Scenes.




What You ll Do




Brand Strategy and Calendar

Define positioning, narrative, and annual brand calendar aligned to AOP and monthly plans. Build a clear moments map across festivals, city peaks, and cultural triggers. Maintain brand guidelines and ensure consistency across app, web, paid, social, PR, and partner assets.




360 Campaigns and Content System

Own integrated campaigns across film, digital, social, creator, PR, and experiential. Write tight briefs, run creative reviews, and ship assets on time with high quality. Integrate with performance marketing to drive brand search and efficient reach.

Creators, Social, and Community

Run an always-on creator engine and UGC pipeline with measurable outcomes. Build social storytelling that is native to platforms and moments. Track content efficiency, completion rates, and creator ROI.




City Marketing

Build city marketing playbooks with regional teams. Design on-ground activations, partner co-marketing toolkits, and Scenes integrations. Localize for languages and cultural cues without losing brand coherence.




PR, Partnerships, and Collaborations

Work with PR and comms on narratives, spokesperson materials, and earned media moments. Identify and execute brand collaborations with F&B, lifestyle, and cultural partners that unlock reach and relevance.




Agencies, Budgets, and Operations

Lead creative, media, PR, production, research, and event partners. Manage budgets, pacing, procurement, and timelines with clear ownership and documentation.




Preferred Experience

5 8 years in brand marketing at consumer tech, internet, or FMCG.
Proven ability to ship integrated campaigns at scale with strong creative judgement.
Cross-functional operator who can align with performance, product, CRM, storefront, and sales.
Excellent verbal and written communication with the ability to craft sharp briefs and review creatives.
High-agency, proactive, and outcomes-oriented with strong stakeholder and agency management.




Nice-to-Have

Category exposure in food, QSR, hospitality, or lifestyle.
Experience with brand x performance integration and brand search tactics.




Why Join Us

Shape how India dines out and how the brand shows up in culture.
Fast-paced, collaborative environment that rewards ownership, creativity, and measurable outcomes.

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
TAP Invest is looking for a dynamic and results-driven Marketing Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will have 3+ years of experience in marketing, preferably within the financial services sector, and a strong understanding of go-to-market strategies, product positioning, and digital marketing.

In this role, you will be responsible for developing and executing comprehensive marketing strategies for both new and existing products. You will craft compelling messaging, value propositions, and marketing content to enhance brand visibility and drive client engagement. Your expertise in market research and competitive analysis will help identify customer insights and industry trends, ensuring TAP Invest stays ahead in the market.

You will work closely with product teams to understand product features and benefits, translating them into impactful marketing campaigns. Managing multi-channel marketing efforts, including email marketing, push notifications, and WhatsApp campaigns, will be a key focus. Additionally, you will oversee product launches, ensuring seamless execution across all marketing channels.

The role requires strong communication skills, an analytical mindset, and proficiency in digital marketing tools. The ideal candidate should be able to work independently while collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams.

If you are passionate about financial marketing, data-driven strategies, and delivering high-impact campaigns, we invite you to be part of our growing team at TAP Invest. Join us and play a key role in shaping the future of fixed-income investments!

jobs.title: Recruitment Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Role

We are searching for an experienced and hands-on candidate to lead our recruitment marketing strategy globally, with a particular focus on the UK, Ireland, USA and India. This person will be an accomplished recruitment specialist who understands how to articulate our employer value proposition and can connect Version 1 to the best talent. We want to stand out in a competitive landscape for what we truly represent and need someone who can appreciate the nuances of working in a technology business where our people are our differentiator.

This role reports to the Head of Talent Acquisition and works closely with the Head of Corporate Communications and the marketing team.

Key responsibilities:

Develop and execute a comprehensive recruitment marketing strategy aligned with business objectives that will be continuously evaluated and refined based on feedback and market dynamics.
Work with Corporate Communications in the delivery of Version 1 brand awareness as an employer of choice through targeted marketing campaigns, localised events, careers focussed digital marketing and other initiatives.
Collaborate with business units and talent acquisition teams to develop realistic and compelling job descriptions and recruitment collateral.
Establish key performance indicators to measure the effectiveness of employer branding initiatives, working to budget and report ongoing ROI of programmes using a data-driven approach - analysing metrics and generating insights to inform decision-making and optimise future strategies.
Partner with internal stakeholders and external partners to ensure alignment and support for recruitment efforts and share stories of our culture, people, and ambition in the right way to different audiences.
Stay informed about emerging trends and tools in talent acquisition, including the use of AI, to drive innovation, efficiency and best practice.
Manage resources efficiently, including budget allocation, tools and choice of partners needed to deliver direct impact and results.
Manage submissions for tier I global employer and talent recognition awards to highlight our strengths and unique USP over competitors.


Qualifications


Key skills and behaviours

Minimum of 7 to 12 Years of experience is required.
Demonstrable experience in developing strategy and tactical plans for talent acquisition, including evidence of successfully managed recruitment programmes and deliverables.
Excellent influencing and relationship building skills, comfortable as a business partner to talent acquisition teams, corporate communications and marketing and experienced in navigating large, fast-growing organisations.
Proven ability with recruitment platforms such as Linked In, Glassdoor etc with solid examples of high-quality, accurate and original content creation and knowledge of marketing disciplines required to amplify a strong employer value proposition.
Decisive and with obvious gravitas, ability to prioritise the most impactful activities using data to inform decisions and excelling at working on multiple projects with diverse stakeholder groups.
A keen eye for detail and data can easily interpret and manipulate data and adopt a strong metrics-oriented approach to measure success.
